title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Combine everything and mix quickly off heat.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and masala paste.
Cook tomato puree and cream together.
Add chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
